briefTitle: Lynparza Breast Cancer Clinical Experience Investigation
officialTitle: Lynparza Tablets 100mg, 150mg CEI, Investigation on Development of Bone Marrow Depression in Patients With Unresectable or Recurrent BRCA Mutated HER2 Negative Breast Cancer Who Have Previously Received Anticancer Chemotherapy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Adverse drug reactions of bone marrow depression
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Unresectable or recurrent BRCA mutated HER2 negative breast cancer with prior anticancer chemotherapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* The patients who are not started on Lymparza for the first time
